cards.name: Day 1: List files in Linux
cards.desc: Use `ls`, `ls -l`, and `ls -a` to explore file listings.

cards.name: Day 2: Bash variables
cards.desc: Write a script using at least 3 variables and echo them.

cards.name: Day 3: File permissions
cards.desc: Use `chmod` to modify permissions and explain what each permission means.

cards.name: Day 16: Python print & input
cards.desc: Create a script that prints a greeting and accepts user input.

cards.name: Day 36: SQL SELECT & WHERE
cards.desc: Use a sample dataset and practice SELECT statements with WHERE clauses.

cards.name: Day 51: Git basics
cards.desc: Initialize a Git repo and make your first commit.

cards.name: Day 61: Run Docker Hello World
cards.desc: Install Docker and run the hello-world container.

cards.name: Day 81: Load CSV with Pandas
cards.desc: Use Pandas to load a dataset and display the first few rows.

cards.name: Day 96: Create AWS Free Tier Account
cards.desc: Register for AWS and explore the console interface.
